name: Software Engineering and Analysis Lab
description: This lab focuses on empirical and formal aspects of software engineering, covering various stages of the Software Development Life Cycle (SDLC) such as requirements, design, testing, and maintenance across different application domains.

name: Multimodal Perception Lab
description: This lab specializes in human-centered sensing and multimodal signal processing techniques to analyze human behavior. Applications include behavioral training, social media analysis, and human-robot interactions using vision and audio modalities.

name: Web Science Lab
description: The Web Science Lab aims to understand various aspects of the web, including web-scale data management, web mining, network analysis, and socio-cognitive models of web dynamics.

name: Graphics-Visualization-Computing Lab
description: The GVCL works on visual analytics and spatial computing, developing interdisciplinary data models and techniques for visualization and spatial processing. Applications include geosciences, biomedical data, and public health.
